author: mklement0
body: The version of the `ThreadJob` module that comes with PowerShell Core 7.0.0-preview.1 is 1.1.2, whereas the latest (production) release per https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/ThreadJob is 2.0.0

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: We have 2 opened PRs from Dependabot but with test errors. I expect we will have new version in next preview.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as answered and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Bundled version of the ThreadJob module is outdated
